title: Dual Threat Danny
description:
Mina and Patrick Clayborn of NFL Network talk about Justin Fields outlook after being named the starter in Chicago, what Stephon Gilmore's impact will be on the Carolina Panthers, the Giants newfound offensive success, the rookies that have impressed them, Baker Mayfield's struggles, and why the Chief-Bills is set to be an offensive showdown.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Omaha Productions, Mina Kimes
